description:
In this cooking class, we bring you to Japan as you will learn how to make their sandwiches using sandwich maker which they call "hot-san-do" or hot sandwich.

You will learn in this course how to put a twist to some of the conventional sandwiches. The recipes are simple and very easy to prepare. The sandwiches can be done within minutes and with minimum clean ups needed after cooking.

Each section in this course presents a new hot sandwich recipe. And in each section you'll find two lectures. The first lecture is the "how to" section which basically shows you how to make the sandwich with an easy step by step procedure. You will find the recipe of the hot sandwich in the second lecture.
title: Cooking Class - 12 Brunch Sandwich Maker Recipes From Japan
